content: The mathlib4 commits feed in #rss seems to be broken --- at least, it is missing some recent commits (such as the one on Riemannian manifolds :octopus:) Any idea what could be the case/where to check?
CC @Bryan Gin-ge Chen @Damiano Testa as mathlib's main CI experts
I just saw this message, and it seems that the bot has started posting again, right? I don't know if Bryan or someone else did something, but great that it is working!
I didn't do anything... it looks like @rss-bot is owned by @Sebastian Ullrich so maybe he did something?
Yes, the bot simply got stuck doing networking or something
